dialogues.text: These ancient rocks emit a mysterious aura... There's a note next to it.
"These rocks are the ruins of an ancient city whose inhabitants worshipped the Giants of the Midlands. They were uncovered during an excavation in the Badlands."
The presence of the aura becomes stronger and seemingly enters your mind. You catch a glimpse of what the walls of this stronghold might have looked like.
Your mind is inspired by this architectural feat!
